name: unmarred
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not spoiled: unmarred by The national park remains unmarred by the extensive industrial development in the country. Despite there being a lot of graffiti elsewhere, the mural has remained largely unmarred.
More examplesFewer examplesThe beautiful villages are unmarred by fast-food outlets, shopping malls, and all the trappings of the big city.Her hearing appears to be unmarred by playing lead guitar in a heavy rock band.It's extraordinary that her reputation as a politician remains unmarred despite being in parliament for over three decades.
